/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and shops, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and taxis are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active transportation. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
